results.title: Simvastatin improves retinal ganglion cell survival and spatial vision after acute retinal ischemia/reperfusion in mice.

results.title: Simvastatin upregulates Bcl-2 expression and protects retinal neurons from early ischemia/reperfusion injury in the rat retina.
results.text_hl: Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ received intravitreal injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ immediately after @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal@@@ reperfusion.

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits ischemia/reperfusion injury-induced apoptosis of retinal cells via downregulation of the tumor necrosis factor-alpha/nuclear factor-kappaB pathway

results.title: Simvastatin treatment does not protect retinal ganglion cells from degeneration in a rat model of autoimmune optic neuritis.
results.text_hl: In our present study, we investigated effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment on degeneration @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@of retinal ganglion@@@ cell (RGC) bodies as well as their axons during @GENE_MOG @GENE_24558 @@@MOG@@@-induced @DISEASE_Optic_Neuritis @DISEASE_MESH:D009902 @@@optic neuritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Sättler MB, Diem R, Merkler D, Demmer I, Boger I, Stadelmann C, Bähr M. Simvastatin treatment does not protect retinal ganglion cells from degeneration in a rat model of autoimmune optic neuritis. Exp Neurol. 2005 May;193(1):163-71. PMID: 15817275

results.title: Systemic Simvastatin Rescues Retinal Ganglion Cells from Optic Nerve Injury Possibly through Suppression of Astroglial NF-kappaB Activation
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ or its vehicle was given through an osmotic minipump beginning one week prior to the crushing.
